messages.zh: 4-9 彻入骨髓（上）
messages.en: 4-9 Chilled to the Bone (part 1)
Meteorite……

messages.zh: 杰西卡究竟看到了什么......？你们也在一起吗？
messages.en: What has Jessica seen exactly……? Were you with her?

messages.zh: ......你最好还是不知道为妙。
messages.en: ……You’d better not know about that.

messages.zh: 不是什么战略上的问题......就先别关心了。
messages.en: It’s not something of strategic importance……never mind that now.

messages.zh: 还想藏到什么时候呢？罗德岛的小虫子们？
messages.en: How long do you still want to hide? Rhodes Island bugs?

messages.zh: （——！梅菲斯特！他发现我们的踪迹了吗？）
messages.en: (——! Mephisto! Has he found our trails?)

messages.zh: （别出声。还没有，这是他惯用的伎俩。）
messages.en: (Don’t make any sound. Not yet, this is his common practice.)

messages.zh: 啊，啊，不想出来吗？
messages.en: Hou, hou, doesn’t want to come out?

messages.zh: 别以为我没看见你们增援的队伍。
messages.en: Don’t think I didn’t see your reinforcements.

messages.zh: 也罢。算了，我有些东西要给你们看。你们会喜欢的。
messages.en: Whatever. Nevermind that now, I have something to show you. You’ll like it.

messages.zh: 说起来——自一开始，我们就是要接管整个切尔诺伯格......
messages.en: Speaking of which——from the beginning, we said we would take over the entire Chernobog……

messages.zh: 等待，等待，等待了那么久......终于等到这个时刻——
messages.en: We’ve waited, waited, waited for so long……and it finally came to this hour——

messages.zh: 这个向乌萨斯、向迫害我们感染者的人复仇的时刻！
messages.en: This hour to take revenge or Ursus, and the people who oppressed us Infected!

messages.zh: 然而，这个分城的这些家伙呢？
messages.en: However, what about the people in this sub city?

messages.zh: 他们逃了。
messages.en: They fled.

messages.zh: 他们反应很快。在我们动手之前，就逃了。
messages.en: Their reactions were fast. Before we acted, they fled.

messages.zh: 解开了地区锁，开足了马力，动用一切移动手段——
messages.en: They unlatched the regional lock, ran at full power, using every possible way to escape——

messages.zh: 但他们又能逃到哪里去呢？
messages.en: But where could they run to?

messages.zh: 我们的同胞，早就在各个城区中潜伏着，寻找着机会。
messages.en: Ours brothers and sisters, were already hidden in the cities, looking for chances.

messages.zh: 最终他们被我们追上，得到了应有的惩罚。
messages.en: In the end they were caught up by us, and got the punishment they deserved.

messages.zh: 这些懦夫，这些施暴者，我们该怎么处理他们呢？
messages.en: These cowards, these oppressors, what should we do with them?

messages.zh: 当然是——让他们成为一个标志！
messages.en: Of course it’s to——make a symbol out of them!

messages.zh: 一个宣告感染者身上的一切不公，终将被摧毁的标志——
messages.en: A symbol declaring that all injustices to the Infected, will eventually be destroyed——

messages.zh: ——没错，那就是，整合运动的标志——
messages.en: ——That’s right, that is, the symbol of Reunion Movement——

messages.zh: 让它们一个个都成为恐怖的象征吧！
messages.en: Let them all become the emblem of terror!

messages.zh: 你们，去点燃那个标志！照亮周围！
messages.en: You, go light the symbol! Light up the surroundings!

messages.zh: 是！
messages.en: Aye!

messages.zh: 来吧，照亮这个城市吧！让罗德岛看看软弱的压迫者们的末路！
messages.en: Come, light up this city! Let Rhodes Island see the end of the cowardly oppressors!

messages.zh: （迅速掩住阿米娅的双眼）
messages.en: (Quickly cover Amiya’s eyes)
Doctor——?!

messages.zh: 警告阿米娅不要看
messages.en: Warn Amiya not to look.

messages.zh: 博士。
messages.en: Doctor.

messages.zh: 请挪开你的手。
messages.en: Please take your hands away.

messages.zh: 我没问题的。
messages.en: I’ll be fine.

messages.zh: ——不，你必须让我看见。
messages.en: ——No, you have to let me see.

messages.zh: 我要看一看这家伙究竟是怎样恶心的渣滓！
messages.en: I have to see what kind of disgusting wretch he is!

messages.zh: （松开手）
messages.en: (Let go)
No……No……puke……
Why……why……

messages.zh: 杰西卡！撑住！
messages.en: Jessica! Hold on!

messages.zh: ——可恶、可恶！
messages.en: ——Damn it, damn it!
……Bastard……

messages.zh: 那些焦臭味......
messages.en: Those scorched smells……

messages.zh: 这里应该是完全隐蔽的，只要我们不出去，他就很难发现——
messages.en: This place should be perfectly hidden, as long as we don’t go outside, it’d be hard for him to find——
Wait……

messages.zh: 阿米娅，你要去哪？
messages.en: Amiya, where are you going?

messages.zh: 阿米娅！
messages.en: Amiya!

messages.zh: 居然是切尔诺伯格的那只兔子？
messages.en: It’s the bunny from Chernobog?

messages.zh: 你也到这里来了？
messages.en: You’re here too?

messages.zh: 还在我面前主动现身......真的很有趣呢。
messages.en: And she reveals herself in front of me……very interesting indeed.

messages.zh: 看来，你还带了不少人？
messages.en: It seems, that you’ve brought many people with you as well?

messages.zh: 这些，都是你做的吗？
messages.en: Are these, all your doings?

messages.zh: 当然了——
messages.en: Of course——

messages.zh: 不运用恐怖的手段，如何减少损失呢。
messages.en: Without terrorizing measures, how can you reduce losses.

messages.zh: 只要十分之一的人的死——就能恐吓住剩下十分之九的人。
messages.en: The death of one tenth of the population——is enough to intimidate the other 90 percent.

messages.zh: 这可是，最有效的减少伤亡的措施呢。
messages.en: This is, the most effective method of casualty control.

messages.zh: ——博士。
messages.en: ——Doctor.

messages.zh: 我已经不是当时的我了。
messages.en: I am no longer the past me now.

messages.zh: 虽然你不记得——
messages.en: Although you don’t remember——

messages.zh: 是的，当时的我又胆小又脆弱，很容易就感到害怕......依靠着你，我才能向前走——
messages.en: Yes, me at that time was timid and fragile, easily scared……only by leaning on you, could I move on——

messages.zh: 也许我看上去依然是那副模样。
messages.en: Maybe I still look like that.

messages.zh: 但现在的我，见过的惨剧已经足够多了。
messages.en: But now, I have seen enough tragedies.

messages.zh: 我当然不想再看到这种事情发生
messages.en: Of course I don’t want to see such things ever again.

messages.zh: ......但不去面对它们是不行的！
messages.en: ……But I have to face them!

messages.zh: 因为我要提醒自己。
messages.en: Because I have to remind myself.

messages.zh: 我还不能退后——
messages.en: I cannot back down yet——

messages.zh: 我还要战斗下去!
messages.en: I have to keep fighting!
